name: Dhania Fake Chicken (Tempeh in Cilantro Tomato Curry)
description: Dhania Fake Chicken (Tempeh in Cilantro Tomato Curry). An easy, healthy and delicious curry packed full of flavor. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 3 cups cilantro leaves and small stems
1 teaspoon dried fenugreek (methi leaves (optional, I love the slight bitterneess from the fenugreek leaves))

itemListElement.text: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.
itemListElement.name: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.

itemListElement.text: Add in the tempeh and mix well to coat all properly. Let sit for half an hour
itemListElement.name: Add in the tempeh and mix well to coat all properly. Let sit for half an hour

itemListElement.text: In a blender, blend tomatoes, serrano pepper, cilantro, garlic and ginger with a little water and keep aside.
itemListElement.name: In a blender, blend tomatoes, serrano pepper, cilantro, garlic and ginger with a little water and keep aside.

itemListElement.text: In a large pan, add a teaspoon oil and chopped onion, bay leaf and clove and cook at medium heat until onions are golden brown.
itemListElement.name: In a large pan, add a teaspoon oil and chopped onion, bay leaf and clove and cook at medium heat until onions are golden brown.

itemListElement.text: Remove onions, and add the marinated tempeh pieces to the pan with a little oil.
itemListElement.name: Remove onions, and add the marinated tempeh pieces to the pan with a little oil.

itemListElement.text: Cook the tempeh for 4-5 minutes until the outside of the pieces start getting golden.
itemListElement.name: Cook the tempeh for 4-5 minutes until the outside of the pieces start getting golden.

itemListElement.text: Add in the cilantro tomato puree and the golden onion back into the pan.
itemListElement.name: Add in the cilantro tomato puree and the golden onion back into the pan.

itemListElement.text: Keep cooking on medium low heat, partially covered for 20-30 minutes till the puree thickens.
itemListElement.name: Keep cooking on medium low heat, partially covered for 20-30 minutes till the puree thickens.

itemListElement.text: Add in some water, salt, dried fenugreek leaves and chili flakes and mix well.
itemListElement.name: Add in some water, salt, dried fenugreek leaves and chili flakes and mix well.

itemListElement.text: Taste and adjust for salt and spice.
itemListElement.name: Taste and adjust for salt and spice.

itemListElement.text: Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro leaves.
itemListElement.name: Garnish with chopped fresh cilantro leaves.

itemListElement.text: Serve hot with Indian Bread, Naan, Roti or Basmati Rice !
itemListElement.name: Serve hot with Indian Bread, Naan, Roti or Basmati Rice !

keywords: healthy curry recipe, tempheh curry, vegan chicken curry
